body:
So, Question...

I have enough to buy Emerald again. So, if I do, can it be transferred into Diamond?

(My profile already says it has Two Emeralds, that is a glitch. If it says Three Emeralds, then I acutally bought it twice.)
body_tagged:
So, Question...

I have enough to buy Emerald again. So, if I do, can it be transferred into Diamond?

(My profile already says it has Two Emeralds, that is a glitch. If it says Three Emeralds, then I acutally bought it twice.)
title: Question

replies.body: Yes, I will transfer it to diamond for you. Or you could just go to www.shop.avicus.net and go to the account upgrade section.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, I will transfer it to diamond for you. Or you could just go to www.shop.avicus.net and go to the account upgrade section.

replies.body: It's fixed? Wow, so basically everything is fixed.
replies.body_tagged: It's fixed? Wow, so basically everything is fixed.
